attributes.additional_details: This will be a service for salon owners only. Not mobile/freelance stylists/barbers. This will not only help salons survive but get people who can’t afford regular haircuts   Also people feel a million times better in themselves when their hair is done.  Help and improving mental health issues.
attributes.background: NHS haircuts for customers that can’t afford hairdressing and make their mental health better.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Prescription decisions are a matter for the NHS and not the UK Government and Parliament.
